channel.title: How do I add a simple dueling feature
channel.description:
How do I a simple duel, where you click duel, and it says to the other player that you wish to duel with them, after the interface will come up, and when they both press accept, it will teleport them to my coords I want.
I DONT WANT ANYTHING ELSE TO WORK ETC: STAKING, RULES.
Thanks Musicmad
